name: Black Label Trading Co. - Royalty - Robusto
additionalNotes: Black Label Trading Co. Royalty cigars utilize an Ecuadorian Corojo wrapper, Honduran binder, and Nicaraguan filler to produce a medium-bodied profile that rules the palate with notes of cinnamon, coffee, cocoa, and pepper.Â Founded in 2013 by James and Angela Brown with a philosophy focusing on less is more, this company recently began to create quite the buzz among the cigar industry.
